// Login and Registration Add Weight Entry Login to view your events, or register if you don't have an account yet. Username Password Login Register Username or password incorrect.
If you don't have an account, press REGISTER. Open Close Most Recent Goal Weight: %1$s (%2$f)
Register Please enter a unique username and secure password. Your username needs to be unique! your_default_channel_id
// Add Event Screen Add Event All fields required. Title Year Month Day Hour Minute Description Add Cancel
// View Event Screen View Event Title: Date: Description: Edit Delete Back
// Edit Event Screen Edit Event Change whichever fields you need to. Update Cancel Name Age: Height (%s): Gender: Preferred Unit Save Share Settings Settings Calculate Home %s's Progress Your Progress Check In Add Today's Weight: Body Calculator BMI Calculator History About Date SettingsActivity Set Personal Details Wipe All Data Wipe All Data Load Sample Data Are you sure you want to wipe all data? This includes weights and preferences!

Trackie will restart Are you sure you want to load sample data? This includes weights and preferences!

Trackie will restart Yes No Stats and calculations will be available to you after 5 entries

You can load sample data from the settings menu Enter a weight first Have you entered all your personal details?

To help make our calculations more precise, you can set these in the settings menu. Weight (%s): Height Weight Welcome to Trackie %s.

Good to see you back Over the last week, your average daily weight change is: %s%s Keep it up! You can do it. Keep pushing! You are %d days into a weight gain streak! You are %d days into a weight loss streak! No Current Streak Your BMI is: %.1f What is a BMI? Underweight Healthy Overweight Obese Extremely Obese "%s, Your BMI indicates that you are %s.
Keep in mind that this is not an exact representation of your health

For more information see our details page linked below Goal Weight: Calorie Deficit: It will take %s days to reach your goal Enter user data first! Activity Level: Share your FitTrack Data: http://healthyweight.health.gov.au/wps/portal/Home/get-started/are-you-a-healthy-weight/bmi/ %s's BMI is: %s It would take me %d days to reach your goal of %.1f%s given a calorie deficit of %d https://github.com/Cemerson77/CS-360-Mobile-Architect-Programming/master/README.md https://github.com/Cemerson77/CS-360-Mobile-Architect-Programming/ Welcome to FitTrack , to begin enter data below Load Sample Data Add Weight Weight Activity KG / LB Don't have an account? Sign up. Forgot Password? Sign In Remember Me Password Welcome back! TODO FitTrack Username
Already a user? Sign in. Sign Up Edit Delete Alert Icon Allow Allow FitTrack to send and view SMS messages? Deny Choose Date Enter Weight (lb) splashscreen backgroundImg Sign up now! ''Track Your Weight with Ease'' Achieve your fitness goals with our intuitive weight tracker app. Monitor your progress, set goals, and stay motivated on your journey to a healthier! loginScreen Enter goal weight Goal Weight Save Goal Weight minus weight weightImg addWeight Navigation Drawer
